overview: Born In Blue is produced using Unreal Engine and set in Mount Gambier (Berrin), South Australia. The story follows Lumy, a young girl who grows up in New Zealand before moving with her father to the quiet volcanic town beside the Blue Lake. In the late 1800s, time traveling villains arrive from the future, drawn to a powerful phenomenon beneath the lake and seeking Lumy herself. At the lake’s edge, her father sacrifices his life to protect her, altering the course of time. Marked by trauma and a mysterious bond to the water, Lumy grows up driven by grief and unanswered questions, turning to science while unaware she is still being hunted. Years later, alongside fellow scientist Ashton, she uncovers the truth the same force beneath Berrin fuels both the villains’ technology and her own ability to move through time. Realising what she has inherited, Lumy prepares to fight back and protect what her father died to save.
title: Born In Blue

original_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem 2

overview: Prompt: Make a Documentary investigates the growing influence of artificial intelligence on the film industry.  The documentary places the rise of AI within the broader historical context of cinema’s evolution, drawing parallels with earlier technological shifts such as the introduction of sound, colour, and digital visual effects. By revisiting landmark moments in film history, the film demonstrates that disruption has always been part of cinema’s DNA, while questioning whether AI represents a fundamentally different kind of change.  Featuring insights from directors, academics, and practitioners, Prompt: Make a Documentary explores the tension between innovation and integrity, the democratisation of creative tools, and the ethical implications of automation in the arts. The film ultimately asks whether artificial intelligence will empower the next generation of storytellers or redefine creativity itself.
title: Prompt: Make a Documentary

original_title: Bugnaw nga Pagputol, o, mga Alingawngaw ng Pagasa

overview: PLEASE NOTE: June 2027 is not a confirmed date. It is our target completion date and may change.  Born In Blue is produced using Unreal Engine. Unreal Engine is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.  Set in Mount Gambier, South Australia, the film follows Lumy, a young girl who witnesses her father’s sacrifice at the edge of the mysterious Blue Lake. Growing up with unhealed trauma and an unexplainable power tied to the water itself, Lumy retreats into science while being quietly hunted by forces she doesn’t fully understand.  Years later, she forms a deep connection with a broken but kindred soul, Ashton. Together, they become scientists and uncover a dangerous truth buried beneath the lake one that links Lumy’s existence to a phenomenon capable of reshaping reality. As the past resurfaces and the hunters return, Lumy must confront what her father died to protect. Born In Blue is a story of grief, survival, inheritance, and the cost of love.
title: born blue

overview: Two teenagers encounter a rock that gives them the power to switch places with the clap of their hands. However, one of the boys struggles with bullying, relationship issues, and sexual identity as he tries to navigate the world as a young adolescent.

overview: In the remote mountain town of Graven Hollow, autumn is more than just a season — it’s a warning. Every thirteen years, as the harvest moon rises and the leaves turn blood-red, the town prepares for a ritual it dares not speak aloud. When a group of college friends arrives for the annual fall festival, they’re drawn into a chilling legend about the Hollow Man — a masked figure born of fire and betrayal, who returns to collect a blood debt. As the friends unravel the town’s secrets and fight to survive, they discover that tradition runs deep… and some roots are soaked in horror.
title: The Hollow Season

After being sexually assaulted by her boss, she sets out to seek revenge, committing crimes that start drawing the attention of detective Benjamín Flores. As Benjamín investigates the cases, he unexpectedly begins to fall in love with Ramona, unaware that she is the one behind the violent acts.

overview: In the early 1990s in West Texas, three ambitious young men begin their ascent to notoriety within their small town crime organization as they navigate the treacherous underworld of drugs, gambling, and illicit deals. Their rise to power brings both wealth and danger, testing their bonds and morality in a world where trust is fragile and betrayal is commonplace.

overview: Plot TBA. The third installment in the Blood and Honey series. New characters will be introduced, including Rabbit, the Heffalumps and the Woozles.
title: Winnie-the-Pooh: Blood and Honey 3

overview: Michael Jackson, now a world-saving hero and musical icon, finds himself adrift after the chaos of the Spotlight Seven. Haunted by fame and fractured family ties, Michael embarks on a personal journey to reunite the Jackson Five—his brothers, his roots, and the harmony he lost. But the path to healing is far from simple. As old tensions resurface and new wounds emerge, Michael must navigate the complex legacy of his past while staying true to the joy that first ignited his voice.  Set against the backdrop of forgotten towns and abandoned recording studios, Michael reconnects with each of his brothers in a heartfelt odyssey across America. With Brad and Samantha by his side, and Goku occasionally crashing in with unsolicited wisdom, Michael learns that sometimes saving the world starts with saving your family.  Stripped of supervillains and secret councils, Michael discovers that history isn’t just what you’ve lived through—it’s what you choose to remember, reclaim, and rewrite in song.
title: Best Of Joy: Chapter 2 - History

overview: The third installment in The Angry Birds Movie franchise. Plot TBA.
title: The Angry Birds Movie 3

overview: "I can’t put words to you, I can’t put labels to you; but what I can put are a whole ton of emotions and feelings to you, and even then I can’t put words to those."
title: Classified

overview: On a warm star drunk night, a young gay couple, Isaac and Arlo, are confronted by a stranger's slur. Hand in hand, they reclaim the word through Isaac's poem, transforming an act of hate into a moment of love, art, and LGBTQIA+ pride.
title: Fags

overview: In a world teetering on chaos, elite assassin John Rico is the go-to solution when the government wants threats removed-quietly and permanently. But when a mission goes sideways, he's given one last shot at redemption: track down and eliminate Mason Ryker, the final ghost of the feared underground unit known as The Order of the Dragon. As Rico's mission leads him to a small, danger-ridden town in Serbia, the lines between good and evil begin to blur. Is Ryker the monster he's made out to be, or is there a deeper conspiracy at play? What begins as a black-and-white hit spirals into a moral storm-and time is running out.
title: Order of the Dragon

overview: Aaron "Amadeus" Overlake is a visionary filmmaker revered for his genius but plagued by his own demons—a volatile alcoholic whose life is consumed by anger, controversy, and from a bitter heartbreak. As tabloids revel in his self-destruction, Aaron’s only anchor is his best friend, Santiago "Baron" Gonzalez, a charismatic actor fresh out of rehab, fighting to rebuild his career.  Bound by shared struggles and a tangled history, Aaron and Santiago navigate the toxic undercurrents of fame and friendship. As Aaron embarks on his next masterpiece, his chaotic life threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.
title: Prodigal Son

overview: The life of the Virgin Mary from the Crucifixion (33AD) till her miraculous departure/death (44AD). It also describes the early years of the Christian Church community.
title: The Queen of Heaven

overview: The third and final installment in Villeneuve's Dune trilogy. Based on Frank Herbert's novel Dune Messiah.

overview: The Avengers, Wakandans, Fantastic Four, Thunderbolts, and X-Men all fight against Doctor Doom. Plot TBA.

overview: Charlie finds himself caught in a time loop inside a dream, reliving an awkward encounter again and again, each time hoping for a different outcome.
title: Unmatched

overview: Madison's hopeless lesbian crush on her straight and taken roommate takes a dark turn when she learns of an arcane recipe for a love potion - one that calls for her own bones.
title: Marrow

overview: Alexandria Wright meets Elijah Martinez and the demonic journey begins. Elijah Martinez finds himself ensnared in a romantic involvement with Alexandria Wright, an unfaithful Covert Narcissist. She convinces him they are soulmates and they take a vow before God for His blessing with the penalty of betrayal being death. After years pass, Alexandria forgets the vows and begins cheating behind Elijah's back. Just a week before Christmas, she abruptly betrays him. To his astonishment, she swiftly transitions to a new relationship, bringing with her the unsettling secret of transmitting an incurable sexually transmitted disease to her new partner. Then came Karma. Her victims arrive to spit on her dirty grave as her demise finally arrives.
title: Duped (The Jezbel Experience)

original_title: The Magnificent Raiders of Dimension War One
overview: A collection of rogues must gather information on a mysterious extra-dimensional threat to the galaxy in the 43rd century, and prepare a defense while fending off the first wave of attacks from horrific beings.
title: The Magnificent Raiders of Dimension War One

overview: Haunted by the memory of a lost love, a reclusive man isolates himself in a decaying estate with his sister and dog — but as grief hollows him out, strange swine-like creatures emerge from a pit on the grounds, and the world around him begins to slip into something vast, ancient, and terrifyingly unknowable.
title: The House on the Borderland

overview: Donnie, a cynical but lovable Cuban solenodon, takes on an outrageous mission: to avoid extinction by rebranding himself as a panda — one of the world’s most beloved endangered species. Alongside an eccentric band of equally overlooked animals, Donnie’s wild journey evolves into a heist-fueled, action-packed tale of identity, belonging and survival.
title: On the Edge

overview: Tafers Code follows five teenagers at the T.A.F. language school in Itaquaquecetuba, guided by the charismatic Teacher Gilmar. Each episode explores the unique challenges and strengths of the students as they discover how learning English can transform their lives. With humor, emotion, and a touch of documentary style, the series culminates in a final project that inspires not only the characters but everyone to take the first step toward a brighter future through language learning.
title: Tafers Code

overview: The sequel to the 2022 film. Plot TBA.

overview: In the aftermath of her friend's passing, an artist processes her grief by making a film. She weaves her personal archival footage and an unfinished science-fiction narrative into a deeply raw and emotive work of art.
title: Elegy to a Missing Friend

overview: A standoff reveals unsettling truths for an old cowboy.

overview: The new upcoming film by Greta Gerwig.

overview: After the legendarily fiery coach exits from the NFL, John Madden teams with Electronic Arts to become the unlikely co-creator of a pioneering video game franchise.

original_title: The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping
overview: Return to the world of Panem 24 years before the events of The Hunger Games for the reaping of the 50th Hunger Games, also known as the Second Quarter Quell.
title: The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping

overview: Nine-year-old Mari is really looking forward to Christmas. Her journalist dad, Svein, on the other hand, loves his job so much, he barely notices the festive season. One night, Mari’s Christmas list vanishes – and in its place lies a mysterious mitten. The mitten sends Mari, Svein and her adventurous grandma on an exciting quest to find Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Stubby the Wishlist Elf is in a panic — he’s lost his mitten, which might just lead this curious family straight to the secret location of Santa’s workshop! He must stop them before it’s too late!
title: Santa's Workshop

overview: A struggling actor with a partially paralyzed face and a speech impediment writes a script that a big movie studio wants to buy, but he refuses to sell it unless he gets to play the lead.  Turning down an offer of life-changing money, he instead works for pennies to get the movie made with himself in the starring role.  The movie becomes the biggest box office hit of 1976, notching ten Oscar nominations and winning Best Picture.  The true story of the making of the iconic movie Rocky.
title: I Play Rocky

overview: Eighteen months after the events at the UNEEDA Warehouse in Louisville, KY, a new Trioxin 2-4-5 leak puts a small Pennsylvania town on the brink of a zombie outbreak during Christmas 1985.
title: Return of the Living Dead

overview: Centers on a couple of school friends, one of whom starts to develop red flag behavior.
title: The Young People

overview: A girl goes on a walk to clear her mind, on the way, she loses and finds herself in a dreamlike wonderland version of the world around her.  (more to be added on film release)
title: The Strolling Field

overview: WANDERER is a religious action thriller set in an alternate, dystopian future where the United States has been disbanded and divided into eight individual factions. A lone wanderer journeys across these factions, carrying a forbidden item: a Holy Bible. Hunted relentlessly by faction leaders and their military forces, the Wanderer uses the Word of God to spread hope among the oppressed citizens and fight back against the evil forces controlling them.
title: Wanderer

overview: Doing what he does best, the Cat spreads joy to kids in his hilarious, signature, and singularly irreverent way, transporting them and audiences on a fantastical journey through a world they've never seen before. Our hero takes on his toughest assignment yet for the I.I.I.I. (Institute for the Institution of Imagination and Inspiration, LLC) to cheer up Gabby and Sebastian, a pair of siblings struggling to move to a new town. Known for taking things too far, this could be this agent of chaos' last chance to prove himself...or lose his magical hat!
title: The Cat in the Hat

overview: A weapons researcher protects his community from an aggressive corporation.
title: Archangel

overview: On another world much like our own, a young Samoyed named Seamus Alessandro O'Shaughnessy discovers a lost girl named Dakota who has unfathomable magic! Seamus must overcome great challenges both physical & emotional alongside his best friend Carolina Oriqueda Campbell-Keeshond to save the city of Esproct from the Menace known as The Blurred Blaze! Can our heroes defeat their foes while simultaneously protecting an innocent child in the process? And who exactly is The Blurred Blaze?
title: Thera: The Inverted Planet

overview: Grace has spent the summer looking after her dad, who is still mourning over the loss of his wife who died when Grace was a child. When her unpredictable older brother Oscar brings his friends to stay with them, Grace is forced to confront her relationship with the past and her expectations of the future.
title: Summer's End

overview: Three years after Nolan Snyder cut his own murder spree short, Collin Woods still lives in a state of confusion and paranoia after that night. Having visions of the NightStalker in his dreams and out in the real world. Seeing a psychiatrist and on multiple medications, Collin tries to move on, but his torment worsens as he comes to realize that his visions have horrifyingly predicted the future and the return of a vengeful NightStalker, one who'll make Collin watch as he takes the couple things he still has left.
title: Knock, Knock, Knock

overview: Bullet and Lace, a neon-soaked, Giallo-inspired nightmare, follows a young woman whose favorite true crime podcast becomes the voice of the masked intruder stalking her through the night.
title: Bullet and Lace

overview: Set in the rural Midwest during the 1970s, Black Hollow follows Jessica, an innocent young girl sheltered by small-town faith and her worldly friend Helen, whose rebellious streak leads them both into danger. When the two sneak out one foggy night, they wander to a forgotten churchyard, an isolated place where sacred ground conceals something unholy. As darkness descends, Jessica's search for belonging turns to horror, forcing her to confront the evil that thrives beneath the surface of the American heartland.
title: Black Hollow

overview: A sequel to Rupert v Nixon and the end for the RNCU
title: Watergate

overview: An aspiring vlogger discovers a mysterious notebook detailing hidden portals in her hometown, leading her on a journey to discover the city's supernatural history.
title: Earth to Colby

overview: Dean Carter's mind unravels while deciphering the mystery behind the disappearance of his fiancé.
title: Forget-me-not

original_title: LEGO Justice League Dark: Till Death Do Us Part
overview: After failing to stop Nergal's plan, Zatanna, Constantine, Deadman and Etrigan seek help from The Flash, After things go wrong the Justice League Dark teams up with Batman and Wonder Woman to stop Nergal's breaches before the merge completes.
title: LEGO Justice League Dark: Till Death Do Us Part

overview: A werewolf hunts zombies after losing his family. He meets two humans seeking sanctuary and joins their quest, protecting them with his powers. Their journey grows perilous as zombies start evolving.
title: Dead Howling

overview: Tara enters forbidden territory trying to find the wendehorn
title: Wendehorn

overview: After a late-night slasher screening, a group of horror-loving friends find themselves trapped in a terrifying game where slasher movie rules become reality. As eerie events unfold, they realize someone is rewriting the genre—forcing them to fight for survival in a film that’s still being written. The only way out? Break the rules before it’s too late.
title: REEL

overview: An idyllic summer town descends into madness when an ice cream man serves kids sweet delights with horrifying results.
title: Ice Cream Man

overview: A group of social media influencers go to the launch of a new hotel on a tropical island, where they find deadly spiders.
title: Spider Island

overview: When a heartbroken man is forced to convince the Devil to grant his wish, he must face the truth about himself or risk paying an eternal price.
title: Convince Me

overview: On the eve of their former best friend's wedding, four of their childhood friends receive a drunken voicemail from her, confessing that she believes she is making a mistake. The four friends then decide to stop the wedding.
title: My Ex-Friend's Wedding

overview: After making a deal with the devil, an isolated and unsatisfied professor uses supernatural means to achieve success and happiness at the cost of his soul.
title: Faust

overview: A “return to the colourful, back-stabbing world of the British aristocracy”, this pic follows the relentless greed of the Fairbank family and their associates who fuel betrayal and murder in the battle for succession.
title: Wife & Dog

overview: A girl’s desperate quest to save her baby brother unfolds into a spectacular, high-stakes adventure through a forbidden forest full of enchanted creatures, endearing allies, and formidable adversaries—where an entire hidden realm hangs in the balance.
title: Wildwood

overview: Architect Tate Donovan arrives in Cape Cod to design a client’s summer home. Struggling with the loss of his family, he moves into a historic home where he meets Wren, a mysterious young woman who challenges Tate’s perception of the world.
title: Remain

overview: The Fuente de Piedra lagoon in Spain is home to one of the largest flocks of flamingos in Europe. Once a year, the adolescent birds perform a dance that looks like... flamenco! But when the flock is attacked by hateful podencos (wild dogs) our heroine Rosie, a fun, dance crazy flamingo, loses her beloved sister and the flamenco is cancelled henceforth. She grows up a shadow of her former self, robbed of her sisters love and the joy of dance. One day she meets Carlos, an exuberant lizard, who encourages her to dance once more - rekindling her inner flame. Over time, she transforms back into her old confident self, before leading her flock to face down the podencos and dance once more.
title: Flamin­go Flamenco

overview: A UFO mystery/thriller inspired by The Twilight Zone. Plot TBA.
title: The Observer

overview: A group of friends are terrorized by a masked killer on Halloween.
title: Slash

overview: In 1993, estranged Street Fighters Ryu and Ken Masters are thrown back into combat when the mysterious Chun-Li recruits them for the next World Warrior Tournament: a brutal clash of fists, fate, and fury. But behind this battle royale lies a deadly conspiracy that forces them to face off against each other and the demons of their past. And if they don't, it's GAME OVER!
title: Street Fighter

overview: Sarah Jamson, daughter of Hudson’s murdered ally, wages a one-woman war against Hudson, using stealth, strategy, and vengeance-marked corpses to haunt him psychologically. Chloe Varenne, a symbol of lost love and innocence, becomes the spark that pushes KAEL toward rebellion.
title: Dolioo

overview: A priest has been sent to pray for a young girl whose soul lurks beneath the darkness of the four maledictions. Can faith ultimately save the life of a child when there is evil that lurks the house of the Pearson family?
title: The IV Maledictions

overview: 4 strangers follow completely different paths through the same day. Leading them all to meeting at a beach party filled with chaos, drama, and action.
title: Currents

overview: A young man spirals through buried trauma and impulsive choices, igniting a thrilling descent into loss, desperation, and survival.
title: Mike

overview: A loner dork gets fed up with the monotony of his existence under the shadow of his narcissistic friend. Forcing the the pair to reevaluate their place in life.
title: Analog Eyes

overview: On a beautiful day in the province of Dickersville, settlers roll into town trying to spread their religion. When the offer is turned down, things turn hostile. This is the "true" and "uncensored" story about how the Mormons became so prominent in Utah.
title: How the Mormons Conquered Utah

overview: A young girl as her family, and their home, are haunted by a sinister entity that is determined to take up residence inside her. But first, it needs to persuade her to let it in…
title: Other Mommy

overview: Frances Haugen, a young Facebook engineer, enlists the help of Jeff Horwitz, a Wall Street Journal reporter, to go on a dangerous journey that ends up blowing the whistle on the social network's most guarded secrets.
title: The Social Reckoning

overview: A modern re-imagining of the fable of the same name. Three brothers leave their ailing sister in the company of a devout and honourable figure as they are guided by an ambiguous stranger through treacherous terrain in search of a remedy.
title: The Fall of Barsisa

overview: Discover the hidden stories Britain's southwest has to offer. From Foxes fighting on the streets of Bristol to Puffins looking for love on Skomer Island.
title: Secrets of the Southwest

original_title: Secrets of the Southwest: Science Behind the Secrets
overview: Meet the inspiring individuals and communities who work to protect our most beloved UK wildlife.
title: Secrets of the Southwest: Science Behind the Secrets

original_title: If You Can Make It Here
overview: Kingsley, Kevin, and Hailey are three ambitious eighth graders preparing for a single exam that could determine their futures. They’re competing for admission to New York City’s Specialized High Schools, elite public institutions that have produced Nobel Prize laureates, astronauts, judges, artists, and national leaders. But as the kids await their test results, a citywide battle is raging over who should attend these schools—the kids who score highest on the entrance exam or the kids who improve diversity. Featuring interviews with kids, parents, and education leaders, If You Can Make It Here places young students at the center of a high-stakes cultural conflict over the future of equity and excellence in public education.
title: If You Can Make It Here

overview: Two brothers are roped into a scheme to rob from the rich and give to the poor, only to find their victims are not who they think they are.
title: Robbin' the Hood

overview: An undercover cop is assigned to monitor a humanoid robot, but an unexpected bond over art leads to a final task: creating a painting.
title: Artificial

overview: The true story that became the basis one of the greatest horror movies of all time, following a journalist attempting to uncover the truth behind several unexplained deaths
title: Nightmares

overview: The fourth installment in the Terrifier franchise. Plot TBA; Art the Clown's origins will be explored.
title: Terrifier 4

overview: The most powerful man in the world embarks on a frantic mission to prove he is humanity's saviour before the disaster he’s unleashed destroys everything.
title: Digger

overview: Just as a couple prepares to welcome their long-awaited child, a devoted couple meets a troubled teen whose wounded heart resists faith. Their paths intertwine in a story of love, healing, and unexpected grace.
title: Uprooted

overview: A sequel to the short film “Too Much Time”. Plot TBA.
title: No More Time

overview: Jo and Raissa find themselves stranded on the fantastic world of the forgotten island of Nakali. They find that their only way home might come at the expense of a lifetime of memories and emotions.
title: Forgotten Island

overview: While renovating a dilapidated house to win back his ex, a young man discovers VHS tapes of an unaired children’s show in the basement. As he watches, the show’s disturbing origins begin to unravel his life.
title: Play House

overview: A hermit’s decaying refuge on the edge of civilisation is shattered by his estranged son’s arrival.
title: Hermit

original_title: Shaun the Sheep: The Beast of Mossy Bottom
overview: The residents of Mossy Bottom Farm looking forward to Halloween – until the clumsy Farmer trashes the flock’s beloved pumpkin patch! When Shaun turns mad scientist to fix the problem, things rapidly spiral out of control. With the Farmer missing and a wild beast roaming the woods of Mossingham, all the ingredients are in place for a monstrously fun family adventure.
title: Shaun the Sheep: The Beast of Mossy Bottom

overview: On Stella’s 29th birthday, four days before her band is set to embark on a career-altering tour, she learns that it is canceled. As she scrambles to salvage the tour and rally her bandmates, tensions rise, threatening not just the tour but the band's future.
title: Stella by Starlight

overview: A man is anxiously waiting for a pay phone to ring, while a dark presence is observing close-by.
title: The Phone Booth

overview: A small town is shaken when a series of brutal murders begins, all linked by one disturbing detail: the killer is dressed in a Mickey Mouse costume. As the body count rises, a group of locals races to uncover who's behind the mask before the killer strikes again.
title: Steamboat Killie

overview: Sisters Elinor and Marianne Dashwood must leave their Sussex estate and move in with a distant relative, facing romance and money troubles.
title: Sense and Sensibility

overview: What would you do if you found a bag full of money?
title: Ratrace

overview: Described as a reboot that won't retell a story from the game series, but will return to the franchise's suspense/horror roots and be more faithful to the spirit of the early games. The film will attempt to capture “the moment that comes in every Resident Evil game where you find yourself standing in the mouth of a dark passageway with one shot left in the gun, and you know something horrible is waiting for you in that darkness – that awful moment where you have to will yourself forward.” The film will “follow one central protagonist from point A to point B, as they descend deeper into hell.”
title: Resident Evil

overview: When an organization that hunts prejudice in art finds its next target, silence is no longer an option.
title: Racism In A*t

overview: Pulled into the high-stakes world of business, a hungry young striver rises fast under the guidance of a ruthless financier. As money stacks and power grows, manipulation becomes routine and loyalty turns transactional. Success comes easy—until the psychological cost surfaces, forcing him to confront whether he’s mastering the game or being reshaped by it.
title: Nocturne

overview: A young woman adjusts to life in a new city, managing remote work, a relationship on thin ice, and single-player tennis.
title: Solitaire

overview: A scorned student uses AI to spread a rumor about their ex-situationship, leading to unintended consequences.
title: SPECIOUS

overview: Pursued by a ruthless, time-jumping psychopath and his squad of assassins, a young woman plagued by family secrets must journey through the desert and beyond the boundaries of reality to find out who she really is and claim her destiny.
title: Jessica Frost

overview: After a therapist's patient goes missing into a dimension beyond reality, she has to enter the unknown to save him.
title: Backrooms

overview: And death and life she hated equally, And nothing saw, for her despair, But dreadful time, dreadful eternity, No comfort anywhere
title: More Beautiful Than Death

original_title: Clyde Saxophone in: The Lick of Death
overview: The Lick of Death follows Clyde Saxophone in another dastardly case. A new mysterious criminal has emerged and it’s up to Clyde Saxophone to stop them. Does he have what it takes to solve this enigma? Or will he get lost in the sauce?
title: Clyde Saxophone in: The Lick of Death

overview: Ondřej Blažek, confronts the raw, untold emotions behind the fight. This UFC-inspired documentary takes you deep into the mind of a fighter, where each punch carries the weight of personal sacrifice, triumph, and inner demons. With high-octane energy and cinematic intensity, Coach Ondřej revisits pivotal moments from his career, reflecting on the emotional turmoil and adrenaline that fuel him. Watch as we recreate one of his most defining fights, immersing you in the brutal reality of what it means to fight, not just against your opponent—but against yourself.
title: Hammer and Nail

original_title: I Constantly Thank God for Esteban
overview: Home alone on the eve of her First Communion, 12-year-old Carmen receives an unexpected visit from a trio of neighborhood roller girls and scooter boys. While at her home, the kids make Carmen painfully aware of her religious upbringing, ultimately stealing her First Communion dress, culminating in a final showdown at their local roller rink.
title: I Constantly Thank God for Esteban

overview: Nestled along the Great Eastern Highway in regional Western Australia stands The Big Camera — a museum housed inside a building shaped like a giant camera. What many mistake for a novelty roadside attraction is, in fact, one of the most significant private photography collections in the Southern Hemisphere.  This short documentary explores the life and legacy of The Big Camera Museum of Photography and its founder, Charles “Chic” Wadley, whose lifelong passion for capturing and preserving photographic history has created a one-of-a-kind cultural landmark.  Through personal interviews, archival imagery, cinematic visuals, and historical context, the film uncovers how this extraordinary museum came to exist, why it remains vital to regional heritage, and what it tells us about photography’s power to document human experience.
title: Through the Lens

overview: When the enigmatic allure of two ancient artifacts is unleashed, two students are bestowed with unparalleled powers. Yet, a relentless collector, driven by an insatiable thirst for dominion, will stop at nothing to seize them, igniting a cataclysmic battle that will determine the fate of worlds
title: Brandon & Haider

overview: While housesitting alone, Danny invites an older stranger over for a casual hookup. The charged encounter pushes Danny out of his comfort zone and into a world of confusion, forcing him to face the mismatch of who he is and who he appears to be.
title: Boy

overview: All In 2026, also promoted as All In London, was a professional wrestling pay-per-view event produced by All Elite Wrestling (AEW) that took place on August 30, 2026, at Wembley Stadium in London, England.
title: AEW All In 2026: London

overview: Disgraced councilwoman of Busterville, Ethel Wilton, finds herself at the center of a pickleball conspiracy. She decides the only way to save her city is to stop the citywide pickleball tournament with the help of her unlikely friends.
title: Pickle For Pickleball

overview: After the world's population has been ravaged by a pandemic, a man lives a lonesome existence in a Colorado airplane hangar with his dog and a dour gunman he has befriended. When a mysterious transmission comes through on the radio while he’s flying his old Cessna, it sparks a hunt for the provenance of the sound.
title: The Dog Stars

overview: A mother living in a trailer park tries to protect her loved ones from a threat that has escaped from a secret military base, while mercenaries try to contain it.
title: Onslaught

overview: After Acme products fail him one too many times in his dogged pursuit of the Roadrunner, Wile E. Coyote decides to hire a billboard lawyer to sue the Acme Corporation.
title: Coyote vs. Acme

overview: During a weekend trip with a billionaire’s son, seasoned mountaineer Ray Cooper and his daughter Sydney are targeted by a gang of kidnappers. Ray’s other daughter Naomi, still haunted by a past climbing accident, witnesses the attack and escapes. To save her family, she must confront her fears and fight for survival.
title: Cliffhanger

overview: A story of April, whose inability to express her grief to her mother leads to a poignant journey of self discovery.
title: My Armor

overview: A despondent soul arrives in a strange place where he must confront his (mostly) inner demons.
title: Soul Trader

overview: 12-year-old Jacob is an aspiring basketball player coping with the recent loss of his father. After he and his mother move to his dad’s childhood home in Fernfield, Jacob discovers a VHS tape of his old man playing basketball on the same court as a hoops-shooting golden retriever. Soon, Jacob begins his own adventure with a neglected golden retriever that he names Buddy.
title: Air Bud Returns

overview: After his billionaire industrialist boss is murdered in front of him, Cole Reed is set up to take the fall for the crime — leaving him on the run as he works to uncover an international conspiracy.
title: Mutiny

overview: The sixth installment in the "Insidious" franchise. Plot TBA.
title: Insidious: The Bleeding World

overview: Meet Ricky, an 8 year old boy neglected by his father. When Santa forgets to put his presents under the tree, Ricky gets granted three Christmas miracles by the Tree Witch. He wishes to be BIG, he wishes to be HOME ALONE, and finally, he wishes for his E.T.special friend Tito to go from being a dog to a full speaking humanoid. But once Ricky gets in trouble with a local gangster, he and Tito will have to fight for their right... to party!
title: Amityville Alone

overview: A social media moderator unleashes a deadly terror when she refuses to publish a cryptic video.
title: Monitor

overview: A very British springer spaniel is lost in India, trying to find his human family. Basil the spaniel must team up with a streetwise Bollywood-obsessed street dog to survive.
title: Bollywoof

overview: A family starts to notice unusual happenings in their neighborhood.
title: Flowervale Street

overview: After winning a devastating war to revive the universe, the guardians of Rhylus Nui - an island where magic and technology work in tandem - live in a time of peace. But when an ancient, undiscovered threat awakens, one which may have a closer connection to their history than they thought, these guardians - an inseparable band of knights, sorcerers, aliens, robots, and legendary warriors from ages past - must unite to defend their island home and stop it, all while dealing with their own personal demons.
title: Kaitiaki

overview: Newlywed Anna and her husband relocate to Alaska, but their blissful life takes a dark turn when a car crash causes Anna to develop selective amnesia. The incident triggers agoraphobia and haunting flashbacks.
title: Epitaph

original_title: The Femme Fatales of West Australian Wrestling
overview: In a world where the spotlight has long been dominated by men, five trailblazing women step into the ring to carve out their place in West Australian wrestling history — leaving behind stories of grit, triumph, rivalry, and legacy.  The Femme Fatales of West Australian Wrestling is a powerful documentary that pulls back the curtain on a scene too often overlooked. Through the journeys of five extraordinary wrestlers — Chili, Harli Hyde, Layla Divine, Michelle K Hasluck, and Roxy Ryot — we explore the highs and hardships of carving a path in a male-dominated sport.
title: The Femme Fatales of West Australian Wrestling

overview: Set in the Gold-Verse Expanded Universe, Killzone the Assassin travels back in time to kill a young Oliver Quinn, destined to act as father to humanity's savior, Commander Ghost, before he becomes the super hero known as Robo-Knight. Oliver, meanwhile, sets out on an adventure to avenge the death of his father. The problem with fathering the Chosen One, is that humanity's fate falls into your hands, which is the burden that Oliver must journey with.
title: Robo-Knight

overview: Bubble, a young otter, lives on an island that had caught on fire. She had swim away to find a new home, she had found a new island that could concur her. But as she becomes aware of their true nature, she has to face her loneliness.
title: Otter

overview: A noir crime drama set in 1970's New York
title: The Motel

overview: The PAW Patrol lands on a mysterious dinosaur island after a storm, where they meet Rex, a stranded pup. When Humdinger's reckless mining triggers a volcano, the team faces their biggest rescue mission yet to save the island.
title: PAW Patrol: The Dino Movie

overview: Inside an ordinary home, a plastic cover speaks not as waste, but as a ruler. From the smallest household corner, it declares its dominance.
title: The Cover Story

overview: Biography of the most famous film critic in Russia, Anton Salnikov.
title: The Movie Critic: That's Life

overview: Mira and Daisy thought one last score would be their way out. But when things go sideways and someone from their past comes looking for payback, they're left running with a bag full of cash, a broken promise, and nowhere to turn but each other. With love hanging by a thread and danger closing in, they have to decide if what they have is strong enough to survive, or if the escape they dreamed of was never real.
title: Bound By Lies

original_title: The Mouse Trap: Welcome to the Mickeyverse
overview: Mickey will be loose in the city and will kill people to search for his beloved called Minnie
title: The Mouse Trap: Welcome to the Mickeyverse

overview: The fourth installment in the Spider-Man franchise and part of Phase Six of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). Plot TBA.
title: Spider-Man: Brand New Day

overview: The year is 2099. With the evolution of AI bringing machines to a superior to human intelligence they have lived peacefully and in harmony together. Until now…
title: RISE

overview: A young actor attempts to finish their self audition tape. But a series of never ending interruptions sends him into an existential spiral.
title: The Actor

overview: From Underdog to legend - From silence to legend. The Taro Donatella Story is the true rise of a man who built an empire alone. A journey of ambition, obsession, and belief in the impossible. - "Mark Zuckerberg & Taro Donatella. One code. One invention. Who actually created the real-time algorithm? The truth behind the biggest lie in social media history - Coming Summer 2026."
title: The Taro Donatella Story

overview: Six seeming unrelated men receive mysterious invitations to a lavish dinner at the mansion of the enigmatic Count Reginald Black. As they gather in the opulent, eerie residence, they find themselves wrapped in a web of intrigue, each hiding secrets, motives, and personal stakes that could be their undoing.
title: A Palette for Murder

overview: Officer Wray is determined to prove to his boss that he has what it takes to bring justice for an innocent victim involved in a murder case gone wrong. His boss assigns him onto a recent murder case involving 7 suspects who all had the potential to have committed this murder. As Officer Wray digs deeper into this mystery, with the help of a key witness and a helpful journalist, the situation becomes more and more dangerous for not just himself, but for everyone involved...
title: "It's Murder!"

overview: Rejected by the person he changed for, Tyler must become who he's meant to be after losing himself to being someone else’s paradise.
title: 'Mr. Paradise'

overview: The sixth installment in the Evil Dead franchise. Plot TBA.
title: Evil Dead Burn

overview: 28 hours after the Rage virus began to spread a group of young people begin to travel to a new safe space
title: 28 Hours Later

overview: Odysseus, the legendary Greek king of Ithaca, embarks on a long and perilous journey home following the Trojan War, chronicling his encounters with mythical beings such as the Cyclops Polyphemus, the Sirens, and the witch-goddess Circe, while attempting to reunite with his wife, Penelope.
title: The Odyssey

overview: 3 friends arrive at another friend's house to watch a movie, but things quickly go wrong.
title: House Party

original_title: Good Cop, Dad Cop II: Electric Boogaloo
overview: Good Cop & Dad Cop graduate from Simple Arrests and are Tasked to Defeat the Dangerous Silverthumb. Joined by a New member and A New Car, The Montage Begins Again...
title: Good Cop, Dad Cop II: Electric Boogaloo

overview: Feature film directed by Hamza Pool, currently in post-production, style and plot kept under wraps.
title: Better Days

overview: The series follows four close friends who live in the all too depressing yet fictional village of Greyville, Ireland. The kind of place you would expect barely anything to happen. But for Eoin McGintley, Patrick Quinn, James Dames, and Marky Mac, the four of whom are just trying to find some adventure and a few laughs, it becomes the epicentre for their many outright whacky and foolish shenanigans as the lads try to just have fun with what little youth they have left now that adulthood lies closer around the corner for this group of immature teens.
title: Lads Being Lads

overview: Prompted by a summons from the ocean, Moana departs her home island of Motunui for the first time and travels past its barrier reef. Accompanied by the demigod Maui, she undertakes a voyage aimed at recovering the well-being of her community.
title: Moana

overview: The second short film by the director of 'Turned Out Nice Again'.
title: Examstress

overview: Trapped operative confronts cunning foil amid tense, futuristic space hemisphere.
title: Do Stars Know Fear?

overview: While visiting her father's apartment, a woman discovers that the man who raised her might be something less than human.
title: Eve

overview: Against the frontier of colonial America, the untold origin story of a 22-year-old George Washington unfolds—long before the Revolution, long before the Constitution—when a single mistake nearly cost him everything. After triggering the start of the French and Indian War, Washington must reckon with personal failure, devastating loss, and the weight of responsibility. What emerges from the ashes isn’t just a military leader—but a man forged by humility, courage, and conviction.
title: Young Washington

overview: XVI Century. Action epic about young Johanna "Of Ghent", who seeks revenge on the holy Roman Emperor Charles V for the death of her father. It happens in a world of wealth, debauchery, violent retaliations, sex, manipulation, and treason.
title: Emperor

overview: After a number of strange disappearances have been reported in the area, Andrew and Jason, two brothers who received a drone for graduation, decide to film around their town to learn more about them, but then become distracted by a new girl in school who lives nearby. The two boys devise a plan to sneak their drone through an open window of her home, only to discover a terrible, dark secret.
title: Inside That House

overview: The new bi-coastal offering will showcase the United States—from sea to shining sea—highlighting some of the country’s natural beauty and iconic cityscapes. This will be brought to life with the iconic elements that make Soarin’ unforgettable – the flight, the sights and score, even the scents!
title: Soarin’ Across America

overview: On Valentine’s Day in New York City, a deranged writer spirals through memory, hallucination, and heartbreak, confronting the ghost of a past love as he searches for meaning, authorship, and a way out of his own melancholy.
title: Melancholy Hill

overview: On a research trip to Greece, Adam slips into a parallel life without marriage, children, or responsibility. With Nysa, a local, he drifts through enchanted freedom while haunted by the life he once took for granted.
title: Naxos

overview: In an attempt to make the most of their limited fun during the summer of the  Covid-19 lockdown, a science nerd and her boy-crazy best friend decide to build  a spaceship to escape the quarantine before the summer ends and they start at  different highschools, but as the lift-off draws near, they find that building a  rocket may prove easier than maintaining their friendship.
title: The Social Distance

overview: The third installment in the Minions spin-off franchise. Plot TBA.
title: Minions 3

overview: A new Jackass installment.
title: Untitled Jackass Film

overview: The upcoming movie from Frameatic Studios.
title: Valkryie

original_title: National Theatre Live: Les Liaisons Dangereuses
overview: BAFTA Award-winner Lesley Manville (Phantom Thread) joins Aidan Turner (Rivals) in a striking new staging of Christopher Hampton’s celebrated adaptation of the classic novel, where among the glittering salons of the super-rich, one misstep can mean ruin.  Marquise de Merteuil is a master in the art of survival. Alongside the magnetic Vicomte de Valmont, they turn seduction into strategy and weaponise desire. But when their alliance collapses into rivalry, the battle between them threatens to destroy everyone in their path.  Filmed live on stage at the National Theatre, Marianne Elliott (Angels in America) directs this thrilling game of love, lies, and social warfare.
title: National Theatre Live: Les Liaisons Dangereuses

original_title: The Collected Pieces of Eleanor Ross
overview: Unsatisfied with her prospects following graduation, struggling artist Eleanor "Nell" Ross reflects on her life with her boyfriend over a game of dominoes.
title: The Collected Pieces of Eleanor Ross

overview: A washed-up Hollywood actor wakes up amnesiac, fights through depression, addiction, and guilt.
title: Sunlight Resonance
